PermissionSetLicenseAssign.name: PermissionSetLicenseAssign
PermissionSetLicenseAssign.description: Represents the association between a User and a PermissionSetLicense.

AssigneeId.description: ID of the User to assign the permission set license specified in PermissionSetLicenseId.

IsRevoked.description: Reserved for internal use. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

LastCreatedByChangeId.description: ID of the user access change record related to this permission set license assignment. This field is available only if user access policies are enabled. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

LastDeletedByChangeId.description: ID of the user access change record related to this permission set license assignment being revoked. This field is available only if user access policies are enabled. This field is available in API version 58.0 and later.

PermissionSetLicenseId.description: The ID of the permission set license the user is assigned to.
